name: TAEKIT - with a grain of salt
name_original: TAEKIT - with a grain of salt
description:
Saltworkers are on strike. The streets are a mess, and it is up to the lone Taekit Driver to make some tough deliveries and keep the salt industry going.

  • STEER with W,A,S,D
  • Find your way to the other side and try not to lose your salt along the way.
  • Press R, or Escape to reset the stage.

Pierre Du Plessis : Artwork, Code and SoundFX

Dexter Roderick : Programming and Design.
